## Suggester.onExit() method

Called when a suggestion is exited with the pre-exit match value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onExit?(params: SuggestExitHandlerParams<GCommand>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>SuggestExitHandlerParams&lt;GCommand&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

Can be used to force the command to run e.g. when no match was found but a hash should still be created this can be used to call the command parameter and trigger whatever action is felt required.
